item.title: Project 1: Green Destinations - HR Analytics
item.description: Green Destinations - HR Analytics Green Destinations is a well known travel agency. The HR Director has recently noticed an increase in employees leaving attrition . She would like to figure out any trends or patterns based on a dashboard that is built for her. Project link

item.title: Project 2: DiscountMart - Sales Analytics
item.description: DiscountMart - Sales Analytics Discount Mart is a small supermarket. The owner wants a dashboard where he can track how well Discount Mart is doing for this year in terms of Sales, Profit and Quantity Sold. Tableau Link
